name: Securing the AI Lifecycle
description: This Knowledge Unit (KU) focuses on securing the AI lifecycle, including the development, deployment, and maintenance of AI systems. It covers best practices and strategies for ensuring the security and integrity of AI models throughout their lifecycle.
outcomes: Identify the stages of the AI lifecycle.
Recall common security risks associated with each stage of the AI lifecycle.
Explain the importance of securing the AI lifecycle.
Describe the security challenges and vulnerabilities at each stage of the AI lifecycle.
Implement security measures for each stage of the AI lifecycle.
Apply best practices for maintaining the integrity and confidentiality of AI models.
Analyze security risks and vulnerabilities in AI systems.
Evaluate the effectiveness of different security measures for protecting AI models.
Assess the impact of security breaches on AI systems.
Critique existing security practices and propose improvements.
Develop a comprehensive security plan for an AI system.
Design security protocols tailored to specific stages of the AI lifecycle.
topics: Overview of the AI Lifecycle Stages (Data Collection, Model Training, Deployment, Maintenance)
Importance of Securing the AI Lifecycle
Security Risks in the AI Lifecycle
Common Security Risks at Each Stage
Case Studies of Security Breaches in AI Systems
Security Measures for Data Collection and Preparation
Developing a Security Plan for AI Systems
Components of an AI Security Plan
Steps to Create and Implement the Plan
notes: Special instructions or explanations: Emphasize practical applications and hands-on activities., Include real-world examples and case studies to illustrate key concepts., Highlight the importance of continuous monitoring and updating of security measures.
